ModMetaData.name: Callistan Robotics
ModMetaData.author: Roskii
ModMetaData.description:
Robots for Callistan users. Requires the Android and Callistan mods.
Protobot: used for basic base building and cleaning, unable to fight Destructobot: used for combat purposes, its a tanky fighter Constructobot: used for more advanced building/ manufacturing Civibot: a useful member of the colony, able to function as a colonist Murderbot: a more specialized shooter, takes less punishment than the Destructobot Domestibot: able to perform more complex chores than the protobot Escortbot: designed for companionship. Rumors of these models going berserk and killing patrons are highly exhaggerated.
